report_sections.name: COVER
report_sections.description: First page, contains a date, project number (Project No.) and Client name. Has location address and report type.

report_sections.name: SCOPE
report_sections.description: A summary of the investigation scope and purpose, contains the proposal information and date.

report_sections.name: PROPOSED CONSTRUCTION
report_sections.description: Details about the proposed construction methods and materials

report_sections.name: INVESTIGATION
report_sections.description: Information gathered during site investigation, including subsurface and field investigations

report_sections.name: SUBSURFACE CONDITIONS
report_sections.description: Characteristics of the subsurface soil and rock conditions

report_sections.name: GEOLOGIC HAZARDS
report_sections.description: Potential geologic hazards that may impact the project's foundation design

report_sections.name: FOUNDATIONS
report_sections.description: Design and construction details for building foundations

report_sections.name: FOOTINGS
report_sections.description: Information about the design and construction of footings, including types and configurations

report_sections.name: POST TENSIONED SLABS ON GRADE
report_sections.description: Design and construction details for post-tensioned slabs on grade

report_sections.name: SLAB PERFORMANCE RISK
report_sections.description: Information about the potential risks and performance considerations for slabs on grade

report_sections.name: CONCRETE
report_sections.description: Properties, specifications, and testing requirements for concrete used in construction

report_sections.name: PAVEMENTS
report_sections.description: Design and construction details for pavements, including materials and thicknesses

report_sections.name: RETAINING WALLS
report_sections.description: Design and construction details for retaining walls on the project site

report_sections.name: DRILLED PIERS
report_sections.description: Information about the design and construction of drilled piers, including foundation types
